ARE PEOPLE PROGRAMS?\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":109247,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/e70bf5bb-7f54-4223-8020-57183e986a18/5.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/e70bf5bb-7f54-4223-8020-57183e986a18/5.PNG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"5.PNG\",\"name\":\"5.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"e70bf5bb-7f54-4223-8020-57183e986a18\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":686,\"height\":521},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":34411,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/59d2d318-6cc8-48cc-a364-a436ab098fec/5_1.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/59d2d318-6cc8-48cc-a364-a436ab098fec/5_1.png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"5_1.png\",\"name\":\"5_1.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"59d2d318-6cc8-48cc-a364-a436ab098fec\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":713,\"height\":152},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"separatorBLock\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We are the Global People Programs - a team of experts in onboarding, learning, growth and development, feedback, and professional opportunities who builds, delivers, improves, and supports unified top-quality People Management processes across EPAM.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"separatorBLock\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":370631,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/340ad5e9-7ee4-431f-966d-3cc479aae596/6.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/340ad5e9-7ee4-431f-966d-3cc479aae596/6.PNG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"6.PNG\",\"name\":\"6.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"340ad5e9-7ee4-431f-966d-3cc479aae596\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":712,\"height\":351},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"THERE ARE TWO KEY ATTRIBUTES OF OUR GROUP:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"ordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We operate on a \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"global scale\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" - it means our processes and products are used by all people in all locations EPAM operates in. To make it happen, we take into account all the location needs, cultural differences, we carefully do change management and rollouts of any changes, and we ensure our products can deal with the load as of performance, availability and scalability.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We create \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"people management\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" frameworks and products for people to use - being a part of the Global People function, we create processes and products which are then used by Employees, Managers and People Partners. We do not do the hands-on work by the processes we create; however, we do gather feedback and ideas on how to improve them.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"separatorBLock\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"To get a better understanding of where People Programs are within People Management in EPAM, please refer to its visual:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":83072,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/b6bc566f-6c06-4681-8ad3-a4c0c22d0e8b/People Programs assets.jpg?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/b6bc566f-6c06-4681-8ad3-a4c0c22d0e8b/People Programs assets.jpg?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"People Programs assets.jpg\",\"name\":\"People Programs assets.jpg\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"jpeg\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"b6bc566f-6c06-4681-8ad3-a4c0c22d0e8b\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":758,\"height\":397},\"extension\":\"jpg\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"You can get the detailed structure of People Management in \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://telescope.epam.com/orgchart/unit?unitPath=Global%20People%20Management\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Org Chart\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"separatorBLock\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"As a result, our team is always looking into the future - how people management will look like in a 1+ year perspective to meet EPAM needs, support our companyâ€™s growth vision, and be on top of the HR industry, of course. We operate in H2/H3 while EPAM at scale is on H1 (H stands for horizon - a term introduced by McKinsey as a part of\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://www.mckinsey.com/business-functions/strategy-and-corporate-finance/our-insights/enduring-ideas-the-three-horizons-of-growth\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" companies growth framework\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\").\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":45547,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/c0a40308-d4f2-4d56-8a21-7750e913d1c5/8.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/c0a40308-d4f2-4d56-8a21-7750e913d1c5/8.PNG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"8.PNG\",\"name\":\"8.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"c0a40308-d4f2-4d56-8a21-7750e913d1c5\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":696,\"height\":452},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"To stay in H2/H3 we constantly monitor HR and HR Tech industries trends and propositions, we look at where EPAM as a company goes, we talk to people in different roles, monitor key business metrics, read feedback and surveys comments - and define improvement plans for our processes and products, kick off new ones or close the old ones.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
